attributes.action: Request the BBC to undertake a binding online public poll to decide which radio stations hould be closed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC has proposed that 6 Music and the Asian Network be closed to save money.  The decision about which stations best serve the community is for the public to decide and should not be treated commercially and without consultation.

An online, telephone and postal poll would better reflect the interest, support and passion that a radio station creates for its listeners.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
